advancement.respawnobelisks.charge.descr: Charge up an obelisk with an ender pearl or eye of ender
advancement.respawnobelisks.kaboom.descr: [Hidden] Be at the wrong place at the wrong time
advancement.respawnobelisks.lost_and_fou: Use the Obeliskbound enchantment to keep items after death
advancement.respawnobelisks.revive_pig.d: Revive a pig at an obelisk
advancement.respawnobelisks.revive_villa: Revive a villager at an obelisk to lower its trades
Revive a wolf at an obelisk
block.minecraft.spawn.not_valid: You have no home respawn point or charged respawn obelisk, or it was obstructed
block.respawnobelisks.cannot_set_spawn: You cannot set your spawn at this block. You have reached a limit of respawn points, either overall or for this block type.
block.respawnobelisks.override_spawn: An existing respawn point was sacrificed for this new one.
enchantment.respawnobelisks.obeliskbound: Keeps this item through death when respawning at a respawn obelisk.
text.respawnobelisks.cannot_save_items: Your items could not be saved due to an existing connection.
text.respawnobelisks.cannot_set_spawn: An ancient force seems to have once protected this seemingly mundane object. However, that force now lays dormant. §7[§9§nHover§r§7]
text.respawnobelisks.cannot_set_spawn.ho: You cannot set your spawn at this block. Instead, explore the world to find respawn obelisks.
text.respawnobelisks.has_core: This obelisk contains a core. Sneak to bypass.
text.respawnobelisks.insufficient_charge: This obelisk has insufficient radiance to respawn entities.
text.respawnobelisks.items_are_stored: The obelisk contains stored items. Sneak to bypass.
text.respawnobelisks.jei.core_info: Place inside of a respawn obelisk in order to activate it.
text.respawnobelisks.jei.dormant_obelisk: Obtained by destroying a naturally generated respawn obelisk.
text.respawnobelisks.jei.obelisk_info: Requires an obelisk core in order to be activated.
text.respawnobelisks.no_core: This respawn obelisk has no obelisk core.
text.respawnobelisks.revive_mob_warning: This vessel shall cradle the soul, but the ever-changing currents of reality leave no imprint on its form. Names may be rewritten, treasures may be lost to the cosmic dance. Know that in the dance of creation, some steps are lost to the void. §7[§9§nHover§r§7]
Stored entities won't update with changes (like renames- unlink and relink the entity after important updates) and won't retain any items in inventories.
text.respawnobelisks.tooltip.radiant_lan: An ancient force might be able to ignite this lantern...
Perhaps this lantern's flame could stand on its own...
text.respawnobelisks.untrusted: You do not have permission for this obelisk.
text.respawnobelisks.wormhole_closed: Vessel has updated unexpectedly. Wormhole closed.
text.respawnobelisks.wormhole_cursed: A mysterious curse seems to be holding you down.
text.respawnobelisks.wormhole_failed_req: Wormhole could not be opened. Vessel seems to lack the necessary requirements.
text.respawnobelisks.wormhole_invalid: Could not find valid warp location.
text.respawnobelisks.wormhole_open: The obelisk has an open wormhole.
